name: TeachMe
0:
”Alexa Launch Teach Me”
”Teach Me Ba Ba Black Sheep”
”Can You Repeat That?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: teach me
des:
Teach Me is developed with the primary purpose of helping your kids learn some classic nursery rhymes like twinkle twinkle little star or baa baa black sheep. We will keep adding more content, more rhymes, more activities and more fun! 

Kids are guided through rhymes line by line with prompts in case they make mistakes! If they miss out on the line our tutor is kind enough to repeat on being asked to repeat. Have fun learning and watch our for more additions!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
